Key.name: HostNames
Key.helpText: Provide a list of the hostnames used in your environment (one per line). Include any loadbalanced vip addresses. e.g. psm.yourdomain.com

Key.name: ReleasePath
Key.description: Location of the Hansen ICX release

Key.name: Username
Key.helpText: "DataRepository" is the Hansen ICX schema that contains the connection string table.

Key.name: DataSource
Key.helpText: Enter the TNS name or Service Alias as defined on each host in the 'tnsnames.ora' file.

Key.name: TNSAdmin
Key.helpText: Enter the TNS Admin

Key.name: DataAccessType
Key.description: FQTN of the data access object.

Key.name: Username
Key.helpText: "DataRepository" is the Hansen ICX schema that contains the connection string table.

Key.name: DataAccessType
Key.description: FQTN of the data access object.

Key.name: Servers
Key.helpText: On which servers should AdminTools be installed?

Key.name: DiffTool
Key.helpText: Choose a differencing tool to view schema differences

Key.name: IFComponentsRootFolderPath
Key.helpText: folder to place custom Integration Framework components

Key.name: ASMServerHostName
Key.helpText: A Server or Virtual IP that has the ASM Component Installed

Key.name: Use_SSL
Key.helpText: Secure requests between client http and PSM servers by using Secure Socket Layer (SSL).

Key.name: SSL_Thumbprint
Key.helpText: A hexadecimal string that contains the SHA-1 hash of the certificate. For details, see the MSDN Library.The Admintools and PSM thumbprint should be the same as the ASM server /VIP host that they are pointing at.

Key.name: Servers
Key.helpText: Which of these are ASM servers?

Key.name: HostName
Key.helpText: For a cluster installation select the ASM load balancer address.

Key.name: Use_SSL
Key.helpText: Enable SSL on this ASM server.

Key.name: SSL_Thumbprint
Key.helpText: A hexadecimal string that contains the SHA-1 hash of the certificate. For details, see the MSDN Library.

Key.name: AuthDomain
Key.helpText: Enter your Windows domain name; this is the domain on which Hansen ICX authenticates its users. For an isolated deployment you can create users locally and use the server's host name.

Key.name: TokenTimeOutMinute
Key.helpText: Inactive sessions time out after this many minutes

Key.name: CacheRefresh
Key.helpText: ASM will refresh its cache after this many minutes, -1 disables the cache

Key.name: EnableDevTools
Key.helpText: Enable GraphQL introspection queries

Key.name: CacheRefreshTimeOutSeconds
Key.helpText: Cache refresh on DM time out after this many seconds

Key.name: AutoStart_IntegrationFrameworkFileAndTaskService
Key.description: Auto start IF File and Task Service

Key.name: Username
Key.helpText: Use the format of 'domain\username' ('.\username' for a local installation).

Key.name: IFComponentsRootFolderPath
Key.helpText: folder to place custom Integration Framework components

Key.name: AsmHostName
Key.helpText: There are three valid options depending on your setup, 1. Select the ASM load balancer address, 2. Select a dedicated ASM server, 3. Select localhost if you are deploying ASM locally on your ISM hosts.

Key.name: ProvHostName
Key.helpText: For a cluster installation select either localhost or the provisioning load balancer address.

Key.name: Username
Key.helpText: Use the format of 'domain\username' ('.\username' for a local installation).

Key.name: Elastic_URL
Key.helpText: Elastic Search URL use format [host]:[port], eg localhost:9200.

Key.name: Kibana_URL
Key.helpText: Kibana URL use format [host]:[port], eg localhost:9200.

Key.name: Username
Key.helpText: User name used to write messages to Elastic Search.

Key.name: Password
Key.helpText: Password used to write messages to to Elastic Search.

Key.name: Username
Key.helpText: Use the format of 'domain\username' ('.\username' for a local installation).

Key.name: Elastic_URL
Key.helpText: Elastic search URL.

Key.name: Username
Key.helpText: Use the format of 'domain\username' ('.\username' for a local installation).

Key.name: PeriodizationDbPersistSize
Key.description: Number of FTs to periodise at a time
Key.helpText: Determines the Number of FTs to periodise at a time

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGAccountStatusFromFt
Key.helpText: AccountStatusFromFt can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGAgreementSequence
Key.helpText: AgreementSequenceing can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGAnonymization
Key.helpText: Anonymization can only run single threaded on one server

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGArrearsRun
Key.helpText: ArrearsRun can only run single threaded on one server

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGB2BSettlementRun
Key.helpText: B2BSettlementRun can only run single threaded on one server* Contradicts Default

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGBilling
Key.helpText: Billing can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGContractRenewal
Key.helpText: ContractRenewal can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGCriticalAction
Key.helpText: CriticalAction can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGEscalations
Key.helpText: Escalations can only run single threaded, but can be run on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGInstallmentFtCreation
Key.helpText: InstalmentFtCreation can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGInvoiceRun
Key.helpText: InvoiceRun can run multi threaded, but only on one server

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGLetters
Key.helpText: Letters can only run single threaded, but can be run on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGPeriodizationRun
Key.helpText: PeriodizationRun can only run single threaded on one server

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGPrepaid
Key.helpText: Prepaid can run multi threaded on multiple servers* Contradicted Default

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGQuery
Key.helpText: PerformQuery can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGRekey
Key.helpText: RekeyCustomerData can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGReleaseCallQueue
Key.helpText: ReleaseCallQueue can only run single threaded on one server

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGScheduleManager
Key.helpText: ScheduleManager can can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MaxThreads:IBSBGSettlement
Key.helpText: SettlementRecordCreation can run multi threaded on multiple servers

Key.name: MinThreads
Key.description: Min worker threads for any Service

Group.name: BSM_Service_Instance
Group.description: Enter the number of instances for each background service. Each instance has a dedicated message dequeueing thread, and a dedicated thread pool.

Key.name: NumberofBillingDeQueueThreads
Key.helpText: Number of billing service instances:

Group.name: BSM_Idle_Time
Group.description: Enter the amount of time (in milliseconds) each background service idles before it retrieves BG_QUEUE records

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGAccountStatusFromFt
Key.helpText: Enter the amount of time in milliseconds AccountStatusFromFt will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGAgreementSequence
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds AgreementSequenceing will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGAnonymization
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds Anonymization will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGArrearsRun
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds ArrearsRun will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGB2BSettlementRun
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds B2BSettlementRun will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGBilling
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds Billing will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGContractRenewal
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds ContractRenewal will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGCriticalAction
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds CriticalAction will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGEscalations
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds Escalations will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGInstallmentFtCreation
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds InstalmentFtCreation will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGInvoiceRun
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds InvoiceRun will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGLetters
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds Letters will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGPeriodizationRun
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds PeriodizationRun will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGPrepaid
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds Prepaid will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGQuery
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds Query will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGRekey
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds RekeyCustomerData will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGReleaseCallQueue
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds ReleaseCallQueue will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGScheduleManager
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds ScheduleManager will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: IdleTime:IBSBGSettlement
Key.helpText: The amount of time in milliseconds Settlement will idle before it retrieves more records from the BG-QUEUE

Key.name: Servers
Key.helpText: Which of these are PSM servers?

Key.name: ActivateASMInProcess
Key.helpText: Setting this to true enables a local copy of the ASM dll's included with PSM. See Installation guide

Key.name: HostName
Key.helpText: For a cluster installation select the PSM load balancer address.

Key.name: DefaultCustomerId
Key.helpText: Enter a customer ID, this customer will be displayed when Hansen ICX is first loaded

Key.name: UploadFilesDir
Key.description: depricated moved to database File upload directory
Key.helpText: Enter a UNC path to a shared directory, this will be used as a file upload location, e.g. \\ServerName\UploadPath\

Key.name: DsnThemeSettingsNew
Key.helpText: depricated moved to database The following themes are available: Blue, Blue-Grey, Gradient-Grey, Green, PayMedia_Standard, Purple, Red

Key.name: DsnThemeSettings
Key.helpText: depricated moved to database The following themes are available: Blue, Blue-Grey, Gradient-Grey, Green, PayMedia_Standard, Purple, Red

Key.name: StateServerHostName
Key.helpText: For a stand-alone installation this may be the PSM host name. The ASP.NET State Service must be installed on this machine.

Key.name: ASMServerHostName
Key.helpText: For a cluster installation select the ASM load balancer address

Key.name: Use_SSL
Key.helpText: Enable SSL on PSM servers

Key.name: SSL_Thumbprint
Key.helpText: A hexadecimal string that contains the SHA-1 hash of the certificate. For details, see the MSDN Library.The Admintools and PSM thumbprint should be the same as the ASM server /VIP host that they are pointing at

Key.name: ReportManagerFolder
Key.description: Management folder part of report server URL
Key.helpText: Enter the management folder for the report server URL. (eg http://[servername]/[management folder])

Key.name: ReportServiceFolder
Key.description: Service folder part of report server URL
Key.helpText: Enter the web service folder for the report server URL. (eg http://[servername]/[service folder])

Key.name: HostName
Key.helpText: The default for a stand-alone installation is the PSM host name. On a production system there may be a dedicated host.

Key.name: Username
Key.helpText: Use the format of 'domain\username' ('.\username' for a local installation).

Key.name: Servers
Key.helpText: Which of these are WSM servers?

Key.name: HostName
Key.helpText: For a cluster installation select the WSM load balancer address.

Key.name: ASMServerHostName
Key.helpText: For a cluster installation select the ASM load balancer address.

Key.name: Use_SSL
Key.helpText: Enable SSL on WSM servers

Key.name: SSL_Thumbprint
Key.helpText: A hexadecimal string that contains the SHA-1 hash of the certificate. For details, see the MSDN Library.The Admintools and WSM thumbprint should be the same as the ASM server /VIP host that they are pointing at.

Key.name: DefaultIccUserName
Key.helpText: The ICC user that WSM uses to log on ICC after it authenticates the self-service user.

Group.name: Redis
Group.description: Select State Server or Azure Redis Session State Provider for PSM

Key.name: StateServerHostName
Key.helpText: For a stand-alone installation this may be the PSM host name. The ASP.NET State Service must be installed on this machine.

Key.name: IsActive
Key.description: A value to detect if a Time Transfer Service is used

Key.name: KafkaBootstrapServers
Key.helpText: Kafka Bootstrap Servers (use format [host]:[port], e.g. localhost:29092)
